rules.text: Indicative simplified baseline and monitoring methodologies for selected small-scale CDM project activity categories

Project participants shall take into account the general guidance to the methodologies, information on additionality, abbreviations and general guidance on leakage provided at http://cdm.unfccc.int/methodologies/SSCmethodologies/approved...
